channel.title: 888 Share Chat Feed - London South East

item.title: [GoldenX] RNS
item.author: GoldenX
item.description: good trading forecast released inline with expectations 888 continues it's growth and potential as it has done year on year despite many pundits reviews saying they would lose out on market share due to buyouts etc shares rose to 170 after last years Q3 results lets hope investors realise the present opportunity to buy and we see a repeat of last year GLA

item.title: [Tipster123] POCT
item.author: Tipster123
item.description: 888 would be one of the main beneficiaries should the Judicial Review granted Friday, be ultimately successful....even without this 888 should be c. 165...

item.title: [GoldenX] worth a browse
item.author: GoldenX
item.description:
http://www.onlinepokerreport.com/us/nj/
suggests possible merger with WSOP as well as info on other online companies

item.title: [Tipster123] Takeover Target
item.author: Tipster123
item.description: 888 is a well run, lean, efficient machine. Unlike BPTY which has lost its way. I think 888 does not need to carry a premium for takeover, its numbers this year should be very good and should see them heading towards 165, some analysts see higher....maybe, maybe not....but 165 is there for the taking

item.title: [mono51] Bwin effect
item.author: mono51
item.description: Will this help 888? they must be takeover target as well.

item.title: [GoldenX] 888
item.author: GoldenX
item.description: 888 have consistently increased turnover and cut costs developed new streams of revenue and yet the takeover of pokerstars and the tax issue seems to have stalled this share even though there has been no adverse effect to the revenue and really panmure 94p not even in the same ballpark as other brokers its time the doom and gloom was raised from 888 and this should rise to at least 170 where it deserves to be

item.title: [Tipster123] 888
item.author: Tipster123
item.description: H1 EBITDA AT 49$M; ASSUMING CASH =EBITDA FOR Q3, THEN 165P LOOKS POSSIBLE...ON BASIS Q3 "GUESTIMATE" EBITDA 28M$....AND MARKETING RATIO TO BE LESS THAN 36%

item.title: [maltaproperty] RE: 888 UPDATE
item.author: maltaproperty
item.description: Just reduced my holding and offloaded 16k shares. It should continue to do well. 888 always seem to perform well even in the most difficult of times. GL

item.title: [Tipster123] 888 UPDATE
item.author: Tipster123
item.description: Update this am, 888 have grown their Poker revenues in q3 and Cash has increased by around $30m. Assuming Cash=EBITDA, then that is surely a record Qtr for 888. Appears they see Sports book, especially Spain as a driver of growth.....

item.title: [Frankiethecabbie] RE: 888 Holdings
item.author: Frankiethecabbie
item.description: Welcome Dynamic, hope your judgement is right as it's been a real roller coaster ride the past 6 months

item.title: [Dynamicmania] 888 Holdings
item.author: Dynamicmania
item.description:
Good day everyone on this board. I decided to take a position today on 888. I see this is not only cheap for now and had some record results but also 888 is going against the general down trend and upward since July.. I also like the fact this is FTSE small-cap rather than AIM so broker analysis can be more trusted.
It has great value across all key metrics, has strong cash flow and as far as I can see strong balance sheet.
GL all

item.title: [mono51] SP rising
item.author: mono51
item.description: great day today. Come on 888 !!!

item.title: [shano1] live streaming sports betting serv
item.author: shano1
item.description:
888 to launch live streaming sports betting service 19 September 2014
Online gaming operator 888 has launched a new live streaming sports betting service that will be available to customers in the UK and Ireland via its 888 Sports internet sports betting brand.
BetWatchWin is a new service that can be accessed by customers via a desktop computer as well as mobile and tablet devices.
The service will offer live streaming of events such as the German Bundesliga top-tier club football league and the Euroleague Basketball club competition.
To access the service, 888 Sports customers should have funds in their account or must have placed a bet of at least £1 in the past 24 hours.
Customers are not required to place a bet in order to gain access to the service.

item.description: Just to remind you all that the interim dividend has increased more than 10 % - it is the key indication of their overall performance I believe the company it's worth more than £1.50...

item.title: [deducter] 888
item.author: deducter
item.description: Not much happening on this board. Triple eight is making plenty of money but cannot expand - so, until the States open up the gates to online gambling properly 888 will offload its profits by way of dividends to its shareholders - 4.5% at to-days price.

item.title: [familyguy01] libero
item.author: familyguy01
item.description: Not that i pay too much attention to the fundamentals lol, but results due are ahead of market expectations. I dont know for sure if sp will rise who does ?, just been watching volume/trades for a while results on 27th plus nevada green light coupled with sp weakness seems right time to buy.im never in a share too long to worry about the fundamentals !.just a matter of time before more and more states open up imo, but I guess that point is debatable and sector is out of favour so plenty to ponder.

item.title: [Libero] RE: Malta property
item.author: Libero
item.description:
Familyguy,
I saw you tipping 888 on GC so I've followed you here lol
The EV/EBIT ratio is okay. TNW is shocking (3% of MC). But it's the thought of this rising cos of the techs that has got my imagination going - how do you know this'll rise? and what do you reckon it'll rise to?
Additionally will the nevada license for poker sites be that much of a game changer considering the huge level of competition in the state / Las Vegas?
Best regards,
Dan

item.title: [familyguy01] Malta property
item.author: familyguy01
item.description: Definitely increased volume, ticking up nicely.green light been given in nevada for poker sites :-).

item.title: [maltaproperty] RE: Strange trip down memory lane
item.author: maltaproperty
item.description: I think it will turn for the better very soon on the run up to the first-half results on the 27th Aug. The Amaya deal is still holding back the share price plus sector in general hasn't been too pleasant. I'm looking to hopefully buy in at around 110-113.

item.title: [Tomstone12] Strange trip down memory lane
item.author: Tomstone12
item.description: I remember somewhere around 2009-2010 when 888 were traded at ~the same levels, they were making 15 EBITDA then. We are at a totally different ballpark here with many upsides with the same SP. This is odd on one side and represents an opportunity IMHO.
